title: Brittney Griner, Dan Snyder and Guest Joe Theismann (Podcast)
itunes:title: Brittney Griner, Dan Snyder and Guest Joe Theismann (Podcast)
description:
Bloomberg's Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu discuss WNBA star Brittney Griner's guilty plea in Russia, and the latest in Dan Snyder's battle to keep ownership of his NFL team with Bloomberg Law's Justin Wise.

Plus, an extended conversation with former NFL MVP Joe Theismann on golf, investing and DeShaun Watson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
